messages.content: Ayana
messages.en: Ayana

messages.content: ನೀವು ಏನು ಸಹಾಯ ಬೇಕಾದರೂ ಕೇಳಬಹುದು!
messages.en: You can ask for any help!

messages.content: डेटा प्राप्त नही हो रहा है
messages.en: I am not getting data.
messages.standalone_question: Why is the data not being received?
messages.standalone_en: Why is the data not being received?
messages.content_transliterated: data prapt nahi ho raha hai

messages.content:
आपका डिवाइस सक्रिय है और डेटा भेज रहा है। यदि आपको डेटा में कोई समस्या आ रही है, तो कृपया सुनिश्चित करें कि डिवाइस ऐप से जुड़ा हुआ है, नेटवर्क कनेक्टिविटी की जांच करें, बैटरी स्थिति की पुष्टि करें, और यदि आवश्यक हो तो डिवाइस को पुनः प्रारंभ करें। 

यदि समस्या बनी रहती है, तो क्या आप सहायता टिकट बनाने की इच्छा रखते हैं?
messages.en:
Your device is active and sending data. If you are experiencing any problems with the data, please make sure the device is connected to the app, check the network connectivity, confirm the battery status, and restart the device if necessary. 

If the problem persists, do you wish to create a support ticket?

messages.content: डेटा प्राप्त नही हो रहा है
messages.en: I am not getting data.
messages.standalone_question: Why is the data not being received?
messages.standalone_en: Why is the data not being received?
messages.content_transliterated: data prapt nahi ho raha hai

messages.content:

यदि समस्या बनी रहती है, तो क्या आप सहायता टिकट बनाने की इच्छा रखते हैं?
messages.en:
Your device is active and sending data. If you are experiencing any problems with the data, please make sure the device is connected to the app, check the network connectivity, confirm the battery status, and restart the device if necessary. 

If the problem persists, do you wish to create a support ticket?

messages.content: Black chukke
messages.en: Black chukke

messages.content: It seems like you are referring to "Black Chukke," which is commonly known as "Black Cumin" or "Nigella Sativa." If you have specific questions or need assistance related to its cultivation, pest control, or any other agricultural practices, please let me know!
messages.en: It seems like you are referring to "Black Chukke," which is commonly known as "Black Cumin" or "Nigella Sativa." If you have specific questions or need assistance related to its cultivation, pest control, or any other agricultural practices, please let me know!

messages.content: किति दीवसाचि बाग झाले
messages.en: How many gardens have become
messages.standalone_question: How many days have passed since the garden was created?
messages.standalone_en: How many days have passed since the garden was created?

messages.content: तुमच्या "test plot capsicum" या प्लॉटमध्ये बाग लागवड केल्याला 72 दिवस झाले आहेत. (सोंगणारी तारीख: 20 मार्च 2025).
messages.en: It has been 72 days since you planted a garden in your "test plot capsicum". (Asking Date: 20 March 2025).

messages.content: सुधाकर प्लाट ची स्तिती दिसत नाही
messages.en: Sudhakar Platt is not visible
messages.standalone_question: What is the current status of Sudhakar's plot?
messages.standalone_en: What is the current status of Sudhakar's plot?
messages.content_transliterated: sudhakar plot chi stiti disat nahi

messages.content:
सुधाकर प्लॉटची स्थिती खालीलप्रमाणे आहे:

- **मातीचे तापमान:** 26.12°C
- **मातीची आर्द्रता:** 
  - सेंसॉर 1: 1 kPa (ज्याचा अर्थ माती ओलसर आहे)
  - सेंसॉर 2: 12 kPa (ज्याचा अर्थ माती अजूनही ओलसर आहे)
- **बॅटरी:** 100%

सुधाकर प्लॉटमध्ये मातीची आर्द्रता चांगली आहे, त्यामुळे सध्या पाण्याची गरज नाही.
messages.en:
The status of sudhakar plot is as follows:

- **Soil temperature:** 26.12°C
- *Soil moisture:** 
  - Sensor 1:1 kPa (which means the soil is moist)
  - Sensor 2:12 kPa (which means the soil is still moist)
- *Battery:** 100%

The soil moisture in the Sudhakar plot is good, so there is no need for water at present.

messages.content: પાકના દિવસો સ્કિન ઉપર કેમ બતાવતુ નહી
messages.en: Why crop days don't show up on the skin
messages.standalone_question: Why do the days of the month not show on the skin?
messages.standalone_en: Why do the days of the month not show on the skin?
messages.content_transliterated: pakana divaso skin upar came batavatu nahi

messages.content: જો તમે પાકના દિવસો સ્કિન ઉપર નથી જોઈ રહ્યા, તો તમારે પહેલા રિપોર્ટ બનાવવો પડશે. શું તમને રિપોર્ટ બનાવવા માટે મદદ જોઈએ? શું તમારી પાસે કોઈ માટી, પાન, અથવા પેટિયોલ ટેસ્ટ ડેટા ઉપલબ્ધ છે? જો નહીં, તો અમે સામાન્ય પાક અને પ્રદેશના ડેટાનો ઉપયોગ કરીને એક મૂળભૂત શેડ્યૂલ બનાવી શકીએ છીએ.
messages.en: If you are not looking at the crop days on the skin, then you have to make a report first. Do you need help to make a report? Do you have any soil, leaf, or petiole test data available? If not, we can create a basic schedule using general crop and region data.

messages.content: बायोजेन चि फवारणी करावी का
messages.en: Should biogen chi be sprayed?
messages.standalone_question: Should I apply a biogen spray?
messages.standalone_en: Should I apply a biogen spray?

faq:
Q: Do I need to spray?
A: Check the disease pest spray schedule for the farmer and reply accordingly. Don't check metrics, only pre-defined schedules to be checked.

messages.content:
आपल्या प्लॉटसाठी बायोजेन चि फवारणीची आवश्यकता नाही कारण सध्या कोणतीही रोग किंवा कीड फवारणीची शेड्यूल नाही. 

तथापि, "Plot No 1 SSN" साठी फवारणीच्या स्थितीचे मूल्यांकन केले आहे, आणि त्यात फवारणीसाठी "MODERATE" स्थिती आहे. त्यामुळे, जर तुम्ही फवारणी करण्याचा विचार करत असाल, तर आजच्या दिवशी फवारणी करणे योग्य ठरू शकते. 

इतर प्लॉटसाठी फवारणीची स्थिती तपासता येत नाही. 

कृपया अधिक माहिती किंवा मदतीसाठी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
Biogen Chi spraying is not required for your plot as there is currently no disease or pest spraying schedule. 

However, the spraying condition is evaluated for "Plot No. 1 SSN", and it has a "MODERATE" state for spraying. So, if you are thinking of spraying, then it may be advisable to spray on this day. 

For other plots, the spraying condition cannot be checked. 

Please contact us for more information or assistance.

messages.content: कल्टर चा वापर करावा का शेन्डा  थांबवण्यासाठी
messages.en: Use Coulter to Stop Bullion
messages.standalone_question: Should I use a cutter to stop the weeds?
messages.standalone_en: Should I use a cutter to stop the weeds?
messages.content_transliterated: culter cha vapar karava ka shenda thambavanyasathi

messages.content:
कल्टरचा वापर शेन्डा थांबवण्यासाठी उपयुक्त ठरू शकतो. हे पिकांच्या वाढीवर नियंत्रण ठेवण्यासाठी आणि अनावश्यक वाढ थांबवण्यासाठी मदत करते. 

तथापि, कल्टरचा वापर करण्यापूर्वी, आपल्या पिकांच्या सध्याच्या अवस्थेचा विचार करणे आवश्यक आहे. जर पिके योग्य अवस्थेत असतील आणि त्यांना कल्टरची आवश्यकता असेल, तर तुम्ही त्याचा वापर करू शकता. 

कृपया अधिक माहिती किंवा मदतीसाठी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
The use of coulters can be helpful in stopping shading. This helps to control the growth of crops and stop unnecessary growth. 

However, before using coulter, it is important to consider the current state of your crops. If the crops are in the right condition and need a coulter, you can use it. 

Please contact us for more information or assistance.

messages.content: कल्टर द्राक्षे किती पानावर आल्यावर फवारणी करावी
messages.en: How many leaves should coulter grapes be sprayed when they arrive
messages.standalone_question: At what leaf stage should a foliar application of a growth regulator be made for grapes?
messages.standalone_en: At what leaf stage should a foliar application of a growth regulator be made for grapes?
messages.content_transliterated: culter drakse kiti panavar alyavar favarani karavi

messages.content:
द्राक्षांच्या पिकांमध्ये कल्टर फवारणी सामान्यतः पानांच्या 4-6 जोडींवर केली जाते. यामुळे पिकांच्या वाढीवर नियंत्रण ठेवता येते आणि अनावश्यक वाढ थांबवता येते.

तुमच्या द्राक्षांच्या पिकांच्या सध्याच्या अवस्थेनुसार, योग्य पानांच्या जोडींवर फवारणी करणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. जर तुम्हाला अधिक माहिती किंवा मदतीची आवश्यकता असेल, तर कृपया संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
Coulter spraying is usually done on 4-6 pairs of leaves in grape crops. This can control the growth of crops and prevent unnecessary growth.

Depending on the current state of your grape crops, it's important to spray on the right pairs of leaves. If you need more information or help, please get in touch.

messages.content: कल्टर चे प्रमाण किती फवारणी करावी द्राक्ष साठी
messages.en: How much to spray coulter for grapes
messages.standalone_question: What is the recommended dosage of the herbicide for spraying on grapevines?
messages.standalone_en: What is the recommended dosage of the herbicide for spraying on grapevines?
messages.content_transliterated: culter che praman kiti favarani karavi draks sathi

messages.content:
सध्या "Plot No 1 SSN", "Plot No 2 Crimson", "Sudhakar", आणि "Sudhakar 2" या द्राक्षांच्या प्लॉटसाठी कोणतीही फवारणीची शेड्यूल नाही. 

तथापि, सामान्यतः कल्टर फवारणीसाठी 1-2 लिटर प्रति एकर प्रमाण वापरले जाते, परंतु हे पिकांच्या अवस्थेनुसार बदलू शकते. 

तुमच्या पिकांच्या सध्याच्या अवस्थेनुसार योग्य प्रमाण ठरवणे महत्त्वाचे आहे. अधिक माहिती किंवा मदतीसाठी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
Currently, there is no spraying schedule for the vineyards of "Plot No 1 SSN", "Plot No 2 Crimson", "Sudhakar", and "Sudhakar 2". 

However, 1-2 liters per acre is commonly used for coulter spraying, but this may vary according to the condition of the crops. 

It is important to determine the right quantity according to the current conditions of your crops. Contact us for more information or help.

messages.content: धन्यवाद
messages.en: thank you

messages.content: आपले स्वागत आहे! तुम्हाला आणखी काही विचारायचे असल्यास, कृपया सांगा. तुमच्या शेतीसाठी शुभेच्छा!
messages.en: Welcome! If you have anything else to ask, please let me know. Good luck with your farm!

messages.content: पाऊसचा किती दिवस खंड आहे जुन महिन्यात
messages.en: How many days of rain is interrupted in the month of June?
messages.standalone_question: How many days of rain were there in June?
messages.standalone_en: How many days of rain were there in June?
messages.content_transliterated: pausacha kiti divas khand aahe jun mahinyat

messages.content:
जून महिन्यात पाऊस खंडित होण्याची शक्यता असते, विशेषतः जर पाऊस कमी झाला असेल. सामान्यतः, जूनमध्ये 50 ते 100 मिमी पाऊस आवश्यक असतो. 

तुमच्या क्षेत्रात पाऊस खंडित होण्याची स्थिती तपासण्यासाठी स्थानिक हवामान अंदाज किंवा पाऊस मोजण्याचे यंत्र वापरणे उपयुक्त ठरू शकते. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटसाठी पाऊस खंडित होण्याची माहिती हवी असल्यास, कृपया अधिक तपशील द्या.
messages.en:
The month of June is likely to be a rain break, especially if the rainfall has decreased. Generally, 50 to 100 mm of rain is required in June. 

It can be helpful to use a local weather forecast or rainfall measuring device to check the status of rain interruptions in your area. 

If you would like rain interruption information for your plot, please provide more details.
